website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality nail formula, with results that will keep you coming back for more.
pros: The flat-style brush makes this formula the easiest nail polish to apply
With regular application, you will have a whole new set of nails within a month
The results are long-lasting and easy to maintain
We loved how fast this product dried
It works as a quality base and top coat, prolonging the life of your manicure
cons: Sits at a higher price point than many of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Terrific nail treatment, base coat.
customer_reviews.text: My nails have never been better. It took about a month of using this to see a real difference. I apply 2 coats day one (Sunday night) , one coat the next day (Monday night)and then my regular polish. I remove it the next Sunday and start the process over again. This manicure is a week old tomorrow. The polish is Venique color "Cushion my sole", it isn't a gel polish just a regular polish (no acrylic nails, just natural nails) with Out the Door quick dry top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Finn

customer_reviews.title: I get complimented often on how well taken care of my nails look now!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sample size a few months ago and love it so much that I decided to buy a full size bottle. I get compliments often on how well taken care of my nails look. I keep at least one to two coats on my nails at all times. When it starts to peel, I take off with normal polish remover and reapply. Like another reviewer said, it dries very quickly, so you can go about your day in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: missylissac

customer_reviews.title: It works, even on “disgraceful” nails
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I have strong nails! Years of competition shooting ruined my nails, the one on my trigger finger was paper thin and torn, the rest were ragged and chipped. A nail salon tech refused to work on my “disgraceful” hands. A friend mentioned Nailtiques and - Wow! - the stuff works better then anything I had tried. They even have coloured lacquer in many pretty shades.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: I thought that this might be some sort of protein ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this might be some sort of protein based liquid that soaks into the nails and makes them stronger. Boy was I wrong. I used to use that sort of product years ago when I was young and trying to grow strong nails for finger picking the guitar. This is nothing but clear finger nail polish. Don't buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: panopticon

customer_reviews.title: heard a lot of good things about this product for years so I finally ...
customer_reviews.text: heard a lot of good things about this product for years so I finally decided to try it after I removed some acrylics and my nails were so badly damaged from the nail tech filing my natural nails so low. I have been using this off and on for months and haven't seen a difference in my nails at all. majority of the time when I have no nail polish on, I will use this instead and it doesn't even harden them or anything. I wouldn't say don't buy this product because of the issues I've had. I'm pretty sure if you used it every single day for months then you would see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: keiera

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My nails are in horrible shape being weak and peeling very badly. I've been using the Nailtiques Formula 2 Protein for a couple weeks now and I really like it. My nails aren't good yet but the product keeps them protected and helps them be a little stronger while healing. I can really tell a difference between this product and regular nail polish or strengthener (which didn't help my problem at all). I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The price has Tripled!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always use Nailtiques for many years and love it and recommend it to all my friends... but when I went to order again the same size as I did last time the price went from $12.60 to $38.95 What happened???? Thats crazy!!!
customer_reviews.author: betty boop

customer_reviews.title: Best nail strengthener on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle. This really works when you use it consistently. It really stops your nails from breaking , tearing and peeling. If you stop using it your nails will return to being weak.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently stopped using acrylics on my nails after 30 years, so my nails were soft and didn't grow very well. I've been using the Nailtiques Formula 2 polish for a few months. My nails are growing nicely and have become much stronger. I use a coat as a base as well as a top coat when I polish my nails. I can even just use this on my nails and not use a colored polish, and my nails look nice. I would recommend this product for anyone who would like stronger, more healthy nails.
customer_reviews.author: Deb613

customer_reviews.title: Use it as directed, every day, and it will make your nails grow healthier.
customer_reviews.text: This formula is for peeling nails. I've used it for years, it's the only thing that makes my nails grow. When you first get it, it seems too thin, but it's the perfect consistency to help the peeling problem. About halfway through the bottle, it starts to get too thick, so then I use it as a top coat. I use it for about 4 days every day, then remove all the layers and start again. My nails are so long I have to cut them now. But if I forget, or try to use a thick bottle of this polish, my nails start reverting. I can no longer find this in my local stores so I purchase it here.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. There may be something less expensive out there, but this is tried and truly works to keep my nails long and strong. I began using it 10 years ago after having had fake nails done for about a year. My nails became very weak and got ridges....this product took care of all and my nails are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nethergirl

customer_reviews.title: This is legit!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this product, my nails slowly reached their short length before breaking. It wouldn’t take much to break - hit anything while cleaning, loose my grip while opening a drawer or picking up an item... My index and thumb nails on both hands developed a dark line down the middle. Both thumb nails regularly split horizontally. This product is the only thing that has help my nails. They are healthy, strong, and long. I’ve used this back in late 90’s when you had to fax an order to the company 😁 I didn’t have to use is for too long then. Now, my nails are happy I’ve been able to find Nailtique at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sugey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I had acrylic tips for 30 yrs straight. Always replacing with a new set every 4 months. I removed them to grow my own natural nails. This stuff is amazing it Made my nails stronger after acrylic removal in just 2 months I have beautiful natural nails now. This saves me $80 biweekly not having to get acrylic fill ins!
customer_reviews.author: Traumaqueen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. I was desperate. My nails were splitting so close to my finger tip that I was bleeding and hurting so bad. A friend recommended another product, and it was a waste of $. I bought this one hopeful but not sure I believed all the reviews. After the damaged nail cracked one last time (already using the product) my nails started growing so strong. Even the skin around the nail is stronger. Nail sometimes crack (I cook a lot) but there’s no more splitting or constant breakage. Also nails grow faster and really thick/ strong. Bought my mom a bottle. This is an amazing product! Worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Made my nails worse.
customer_reviews.text: I applied this as direct for about 2-3 months. It actually made my nails worse. Now instead of 1 delaminating nail (top and bottom layers of nail separating), I have 3, and have to keep all my nails super short to keep from the nails peeling off entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L Fesl

customer_reviews.title: Every time I wanted to let them go natural I ended up putting fake nails back on because the process was so painful. After using this for a few short says ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore artificial nails for years. When I decided to take them off and grow out my natural nails this is the product that helped me through the process! My nails were so thin and they actually hurt. Every time I wanted to let them go natural I ended up putting fake nails back on because the process was so painful. After using this for a few short says my nails started improving. I am happy to say my nails are now healthy and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ourada

customer_reviews.title: Best nail product ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting fragile nails my whole life. Have tried many treatments over the years with little success. Since using this product, I have had remarkable results. I find myself frequently trimming nails that have grown too long. In the past, they never would have reached that point. I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: bzmom

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the real product. It is in the correct bottle but my nails did not respond 1/10th as much as they did from the bottle I bought at ulta. Spend a little more and get the real thing from a reputable store.
customer_reviews.author: t. m. u.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This polish is amazing. It allows your natural nails to grow without peeling or breaking, something I struggled with before. I constantly get asked if my nails are real, and always tell them it’s Nailtiques polish. I was using another brand that took forever to dry, so I switched to this about a year ago. I use two coats under my polish, then after about 3 days paint it over my polish to extend the life of my manicure. It dries super fast! Well worth the price! I’m never without this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Julyaeo

customer_reviews.title: Blasted Robbery.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased using the product and it helped as I am a health professional and my hands are constantly in water and hand sanitizer. However what I don’t get is how a nail polish went from 12 dollars to over 100 is beyond me and it is so disgusting and distasteful that the price went up so drastically. However it works I will say that.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Hagley

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Sally Hansen Hard as Nails for about 20 years but found it to be too thick the last few times I purchased it. I like this so much better! Goes on smoothly and dries quickly! I apply one coat every day for about 4-5 days and then start over again. Makes my nails strong, shiny, and look manicured. The smell is like any other polish and I didn't find it overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: The9Ts

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I had acrylic & gel nails for years and ruined my nails. When I finally retired and decided to take them off it was over a year and my nails were still peeling & breaking and refused to grow beyond the edge of my fingers!!!! Nailtiques was suggested by a manicurist and my Nails ( after about six months) are now growing again and looking healthy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Todd

customer_reviews.title: 4 month growth update after acrylic nail removal
customer_reviews.text: A game changer. My natural nails have been growing back stronger and longer. Since removal of my arcylic nails. Photo right and left after acrylic removal and 2 months later healthy nail. New photo of growth december 2019, now 4 month of use after removal of acrylic nails
customer_reviews.author: Hopsong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I almost done with the first bottle. This nail cover polish applied under a coat of the formula alemana have permitted that my nail are stronger and heathly.
customer_reviews.author: AVA

customer_reviews.title: This works but it will take some time.
customer_reviews.text: After having over a year chemotherapy followed by open heart surgery my nails were a disaster. They were splitting from the center top down a bit and I couldn't get them grown out. I have used this product faithfully for the past 6 months and have seen a marked improvement in my nails. I can actually grow them past the my finger tip which is what I wanted. Great product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I use this a couple of times a week. Recommended by my dermatologist about 10 years ago when my nails were splitting a lot. Within two weeks I could see a big difference! I have kept on using it since and my nails are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Darmody

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Orly but ran out and I couldn’t find it here in town. This stuff is equally on par with the Orly product! Definitely will purchase again! Update: Polish peels and flakes after a few days. Nails are still brittle and weak. Breakage constantly. Orly is the best, I promise you!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best nail strengthener ever. It dries in a reasonable time, looks very shiny and really improves nails. My nails are harder, break less and the tips look whiter. I use it alone or under colored polish.
customer_reviews.author: jess h

customer_reviews.title: Short splitting nails are now long and strong
customer_reviews.text: My nails went from short and splitting, to long and strong. This color has been on for 3 weeks. I put it on almost every day and it is fantastic. I've been using it for about a year and what I've described is so typical. I will not be without it, it dries fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nail Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am very impress by the results. My nail tech use it as base coat and top coat over my polish and the polish lasted the entire week on my natural nails without peeling and chipping away in two days. My nails are also noticeably stronger with my weekly application.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Terrific results. I have used this before after fake nails and decided to try again when my nails took a turn this winter. Not an overnight fix but using along with diet changes brought my nails back. Still working on growth but before/after photo speaks for itself!
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Works great, dries incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the 2+ formula for months and now my nails have strengthened considerably, though it took time. I put it on every day over the old coat until it starts peeling, then I just peel them off and reapply. I am extremely happy with how my nails improved, they used to break and peel constantly and now I have long, strong nails that hardly break. I just started using this 2 formula and it's great. I like the bigger bottle and brush much better than the 2+. This product dries incredibly fast which makes it so much easier to use every day.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a nail strengthener that works (for real)
customer_reviews.text: My nails have been brittle my whole and I’ve never found anything to actually work (biotin pills, other strengtheners, taking breaks from gel and SNS powder). This polish has made them longer than they’ve ever been and stronger too. I still have one break from time to time, but I love looking at my natural nails now. They look SO healthy that old girlfriends of mine even noticed them without me saying anything. HIGHLY recommend this product. I’ll be using it for life.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Does
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does what it says. My nails were beautiful when using it. Problem is it costs too much. You apply it once a day so it doesn’t last as long as a “typical” bottle of polish.
customer_reviews.author: Banditgirl222

customer_reviews.title: This product really really works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my nails in good shape. Also use as a final coat to polish and you can put more coats on every other day until you have 4 or 5 coats. Makes your polish last longer.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Obertal

customer_reviews.title: Nailtiques Formula 2 Protein works great to strength & grow nails
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as advertised, works perfect, promotes nail growth & strength, fast delivery, will definitely buy from Seller again, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: d2chin

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that delivers! My nails went from splits, tearing and breaking to 90% improvement in two weeks! LOVE it and how fast it dries, I put it on daily! After a month of use I have long fantastic nails that are strong! TY TY TY customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My nails are always peeling and I could not find a product that worked. I’ve tried many. This product works. My nails are much stronger and the peeling has stopped. I mean sure it’s got formaldehyde resin and formalin in it, but my nails have never been better! I think those are the secret ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: A godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to grow my nails out for years, but they are always too weak and brittle even when long. This stuff definitely helps. Only complaint is that a bottle doesn't last very long and the stuff really only works when it is on the nail. It doesn't strengthen the nail unless it's on there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Started in October 2018. Current photo shows my nails that are.healthy and strong Great product. Took maybe 2 months to start growing out. Prior to using this product my nails were brittle and didn’t grow.
customer_reviews.author: tracy jordan

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is the real product. I have been using nailtiques 2 for many years and this is the first time my nails are breaking , chipping and turning yellow. I’ll Certainly never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bperils

customer_reviews.title: Great nail strengthener
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a problem with my thumb nails splitting in the corners and thought I would give this polish a try. It has strengthened the nail tremendously and they haven't split or broke off since wearing the polish.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Burch

customer_reviews.title: Your nails will grow strong, wont break!
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to buy and skip the salon. Worth every penny! Instructions from a Nailtech on how to use: Use it 3 times a week. Apply every other day. Remove at the end of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Maria del Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Started using a bottle my wife had to harden her nails and it worked so well I ordered my own. Dries fast and puts a shine to the nails and does the hardening as advertised. Acrid aroma, but that goes away fast. Dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L

customer_reviews.title: I WILL NEVER GET ACRYLICS AGAIN! I have been natural for 3 years now. Awsome nourishment for weaker, chipped nails!
customer_reviews.text: Such help with the health of my nails. You must be patient, as it does take time to heal and nourish your nails back to health. I have noticed my nails are WHITE! I always had yellow nails. I do not know why. I have tried many products to get rid of the yellowing. Nothing worked, until I nourished my nails back to health with Nailtiques. I no longer spend money at the nail salons. I am natural and save oh so much money! Plus, my nails dont take the hit from all the shaving for the acrylics! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended after having acrylic and gels on my less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Recommended after having acrylic and gels on my less than fantastic nails. Seems to help keep them a tad stronger. I would recommend it to others as it was recommended by a nail person.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: This stuff dries fast and looks like clear nail polish
customer_reviews.text: This stuff dries fast and looks like clear nail polish, it really does help your nails from breaking imo
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Nails don't break
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Nailtique products for nearly 20 years. It hardens my nails and keeps them from breaking. Easy to apply, just clear nailpolish.
customer_reviews.author: J Joy S

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: Getting better. I started with Formula 1 as recommended, but my nails still kept breaking, so I went to Formula 2. It has helped more, but I am now using Formula 2 Plus. It is hard when you have old, weakened nails. Too many years of hard work and abuse and not taking care of my nails properly. I simply cannot wear gloves so my nails take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Demaree

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: For helping my thin splitting nails to grow beautifully, this is the only product I have ever used that actually works. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for strong nails. I was told years ago to put it on clean nails every Sunday and once during the week and repeat the process every week. It works! Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Busia

customer_reviews.title: Solution for peeling and chipping nails
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the transformation of my nails after using this product for a few weeks. No more chipping or peeling nails! I had my solar nails removed after having them for at least 10 years. I was concerned about having my natural nails because previously they always peeled and broke. This product is my new solution and saves me money and time because I no longer have to go to my nail technician. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!! I wore fake nails for decades and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!! I wore fake nails for decades and because of economic reasons I had to take them off. I was religious about applying it a couple times a week and now I’m able to wear regular polish and my nails are long, strong and don’t break. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Lori Blackbern

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: My name were damage from wearing gel nails. This product restored my nails they look healthy and strong. It's a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Wounded Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to soft breaking nails
customer_reviews.text: Nailtiques Formula 2 stopped my nails from peeling & breaking. Recommended this to a beautician friend who was having similar issues. She now recommends it to her clientele.
customer_reviews.author: KCR231

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I was initially hesitant about buying this based on price alone. However my nails were so damaged after having acrylics on for months that I thought I’d give it a chance. I was not disappointed. This product saved my nails. Will repurchase time and again.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Karina

customer_reviews.title: Great formula for great nails!!
customer_reviews.text: This polish is fantastic!! If you have trouble with breaking, brittle, problem nails you have GOT to try this. Several of my friends have tried it and love it too. My nails are long, strong and lovely (at 71 I can brag a tad). I think you'll be very pleased if you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nails!
customer_reviews.text: If you put in the work...apply every couple days and take care of your nails this product will work!! I apply halfway above the nail bed and coat nail on backside. They are long hard n strong product has a strong smell so well ventilate
customer_reviews.author: Paulie girl

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Help for soft, peeling nails!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had soft, thin nails that tear, peel and break. In a desperation move I ordered Nailtiques Formula 2 Protein. This stuff is wonderful. Within just a few days I could tell a difference in my nails and now, after a month of fairly consistent use I have much stronger nails and there is no more peeling and only one minor break. I'm rough on my nails since I've never had nice nails to watch out for and they are holding up well. I can't say enough about how well this works. If you want stronger, healthy looking, attractive nails you have got to give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: carol deskin

customer_reviews.title: Really works, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Makes my nails grow when then never would. Use it for first coat before manicure or just wear it without polish for a shiny nail. My daughter bites her nails and it helps restore the nail bed. Love this product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: and my nails look great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has worked wonders for my nails. I do water aerobics 3 times a week and the chlorine was ruining my nails. I wear the nailtiques formula 2 all the time now, and my nails look great.
customer_reviews.author: ez56

customer_reviews.title: Painting the nails clear. We're painting the nails clear. We dare not stop or waste a drop. So let the paint be spread!
customer_reviews.text: It works. Strengthens my nails which have a habit of peeling in layers which is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it consistently and it makes a great difference. My nails are growing and look healthier than before.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle! I’ve been using for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a bottle! I’ve been using for years and will never be without. I no longer deal with thin pealing nails.
customer_reviews.author: Pulchritude1200

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product! It works exceptionally! Use it as directed. My nails are long and beautiful because of this. I wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My nails were dull/brittle weak and look horrible. This polish brought my nails back to life
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I used for two weeks straight have removing my acrylics which I used for weeks. My nails were dull/brittle weak and look horrible. This polish brought my nails back to life!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Great price on Nailtiques 2 which I typically purchase in Harmons the 16.99 and even with a 20% discount it was less through this vendor I received this package 3 days earlier than I expected. Will now be my go-to when I find myself running low and needing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kind of nail proteins but this one is the best by far. I get so many compliments when I use this. Best of all, I haven't had issues with yellowing nails like I did with the OPI nail protein.
customer_reviews.author: Sbullet

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Nails!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough great things about this nail repair. Really disappointed it has been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Box empty
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived empty. No nail polish inside at all. So upset!
customer_reviews.author: LisaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Need nail help
customer_reviews.text: Nail help that always worked in the past. Hoping it will help now too.
customer_reviews.author: californiabelle

customer_reviews.title: working great
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is working great. My nails always break in the corners and my protein absorption is not so good due to some medical issues. My nails look great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqui

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and natural nails
customer_reviews.text: Best nail strengthner and growth treatment by far. My nails are long strong healthy and beautiful, worth every dollar. Don’t hesitate to buy and Amazon have the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Goldy*

customer_reviews.title: Great for brittle nails!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as the base and then two coats of nail polish over that. It has made my nails much stronger and my nail polish lasts longer even with all the cooking and cleaning I do. I even take it with me to use when I get my nails done at a salon. This stuff is great and a whole lot cheaper than buying it at a drug store. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew how bad this product is before purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew how bad this product is before purchasing it. Ever since I've been using this my nails have gotten brittle and just one day after applying each time, I broke one nail at a time. I also had my mother use this and she also thought this does worst than helping the nails. I wish I could return it, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilah

customer_reviews.title: The bottle won't open, glues shut!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like, used it twice, third time I couldn't get the bottle opened!!! It was glued closed!!
customer_reviews.author: HelloBeautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Problem Nails
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nail product I have found to strengthen my weak nails. I have used it for years and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: linjsev

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have helped my nails a lot. Worth it for those that can dedicate themselves to the process
customer_reviews.author: Anna maloit

customer_reviews.title: This is the only polish I can wear to keep my nails from chipping.
customer_reviews.text: Important to apply daily, then remove after several days and start over. The polish dries quickly, within 2-4 minutes, unlike other polish when you have to be careful not to touch anything for ten minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I would need to use it consistently to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this polish before and really like it. The service by the seller was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bcb

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. My nails were in bad shape after I took the false ones off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My nails were in bad shape after I took the false ones off. This product saved my nails
customer_reviews.author: Marci W

customer_reviews.title: This works so well!!. It really stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: This works so well!!. It really stopped my nails from pealing and I use it as base coat all the time. It keeps my polish from chipping and keeps my nails from breaking.
customer_reviews.author: pat H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible ingredients in this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Read ingredients! Stay away! Contains horrible ingredients like formaldehyde! Just Google what to stay away from in nail products and read what the ingredients are in this stuff...I don't think strong nails are worth a risk of cancer!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bushey

customer_reviews.title: Nail miracle
customer_reviews.text: Simply this is a miracle. Yesterday my nail tech used it before the polish and noted there was nothing better than Nailtiques 2 .
customer_reviews.author: Patty Miller Palmer

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for years and I wouldn't have long nice nails without it
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years and I wouldn't have long nice nails without it! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for anyone with soft nails that just wouldn't grow
customer_reviews.text: The only thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars is the same issue I have with all fingernail products. The brushes are too short to reach the product when it starts to get low in volume. Other than that this is the only product that has allowed me to grow nails EVER! Highly recommended for anyone with soft nails that just wouldn't grow.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS and you get it fast from this vendoe
customer_reviews.text: Fast service on an item I just cannot be without. Best I have found in many years of wearing one product or another, one for nearly a decade! My nails are in better shape than they have been at any time in my life.
customer_reviews.author: msreduch

customer_reviews.title: Deff works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really helped my nails grow as I was s nail bitter for 20 years. Now, everyone thinks I'm wearing tips!
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a decade
customer_reviews.text: This is a no fail product. I have tried cheaper brands, but nothing is as effective as this product. I use as a base coat when I go for a manicure, then every other day after my manicure I put on a top coat. My manicure lasts at least 1 week chip free, and if I am very careful and diligent with applications, 2 weeks. My nails break often if I do not use. The shellac/gel polish absolutely weaken my nails. If I do OCCASSIONALLY get this type of polish (when going on vacation), I use Nailtiques with my normal manicure immediately when I take the shellac/gel polish off.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Split Nails:  Excellent Solution
customer_reviews.text: Had splitting nails and this helped them grow out! Amazing. The only thing that helped my nails grow back normally.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I am a notorious nail biter and I was hoping this polish would help harden my nails and strengthen them over time. Ive been using this for weeks and haven't really seen much of a difference like I have with another product I started using recently. It didn't really work or do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ellary Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 37 years old and I was never able to grow my nails out until I started using this product a year ago. This is my third time purchasing this stuff and I will always make sure I have Formula 2 on hand! It is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING what this product will do to help your nails grow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crifi

customer_reviews.title: This stuff REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: If you have short, thin, brittle nails that just won't grow... get this stuff! It is amazing and really works!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life??
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely AMAZING! I can’t say enough about it! My whole life my nails have been sooo weak. They peel, bend and if they did manage to grow out, they would be flat with no curve. I’ve been using this for a little over a month & I can’t believe the difference! I get compliments on my nails all the time & everyone I’ve shown these pics to have ordered some for themselves! Where has this been all my life??
customer_reviews.author: DeDe Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you follow directions to the T
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as you follow directions to the T. I have been slacking and by looking at my nails they can tell lol All in all great product, won't be disappointed 😉
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ipps

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: After removing polish, and wiping nails with alcohol, this adheres incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well to strengthen my very soft and fragile toe nails. Adds longevity to my pedicures, as it aids in keeping polish from chipping off. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: SiouxzQ

customer_reviews.title: Used it for years
customer_reviews.text: My nails have always been thin and sometimes split and peel. Nailtiques have made it possible to grow nice looking nails that stand up to housework and gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Fla. Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Helps me nails to grow.
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has helped my nails to become more sturdy. There is a lot less breakages.

customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT. NEVER HAD LONG NAILS UNTIL I STARTED USING THIS PRODUCT. IT WORKS
